statements: SELECT * FROM employee_code_of_conduct_acknowledgments;
SELECT acknowledgment_date, acknowledgment_statement FROM employee_code_of_conduct_acknowledgments WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT acknowledgment_date, employee_id FROM employee_code_of_conduct_acknowledgments ORDER BY acknowledgment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_code_of_conduct_acknowledgments WHERE acknowledgment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT employee_id, acknowledgment_statement FROM employee_code_of_conduct_acknowledgments WHERE acknowledgment_statement LIKE '%agrees%';
SELECT * FROM employee_code_of_conduct_acknowledgments WHERE acknowledgment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY acknowledgment_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, acknowledgment_date FROM employee_code_of_conduct_acknowledgments WHERE employee_id = 1001 OR employee_id = 1003
SELECT acknowledgment_statement FROM employee_code_of_conduct_acknowledgments WHERE acknowledgment_statement LIKE '%confidential%';
SELECT * FROM employee_code_of_conduct_acknowledgments WHERE acknowledgment_date <= '2022-03-31'
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) as total_acknowledgments FROM employee_code_of_conduct_acknowledgments
SELECT * FROM employee_code_of_conduct;
SELECT employee_name, employee_id, conduct_acknowledgment_date FROM employee_code_of_conduct;
SELECT monitoring_notes, monitoring_date, monitoring_id FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT employee_name, conduct_acknowledgment_date FROM employee_code_of_conduct WHERE employee_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM employee_code_of_conduct WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_code_of_conduct ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE monitoring_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, MIN(monitoring_date) AS first_monitoring FROM compliance_monitoring GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT employee_name, monitoring_date FROM employee_code_of_conduct JOIN compliance_monitoring ON employee_code_of_conduct.employee_id = compliance_monitoring.employee_id ORDER BY monitoring_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAcknowledgments;
SELECT employee_id, acknowledgment_date, compliance_status FROM EmployeeAcknowledgments;
SELECT acknowledgment_id, employee_id, acknowledgment_date, compliance_status FROM EmployeeAcknowledgments WHERE compliance_status='Pending';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM EmployeeDetails ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT officer_name, email FROM ComplianceOfficers WHERE department='HR' ORDER BY officer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeAcknowledgments ORDER BY acknowledgment_date DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, acknowledgment_date FROM EmployeeAcknowledgments WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT officer_name, department FROM ComplianceOfficers WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeDetails WHERE department IN ('IT', 'HR') ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT e.employee_name, c.officer_name FROM EmployeeDetails e INNER JOIN ComplianceOfficers c ON e.department = c.department;
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT full_name, department FROM employee WHERE department='HR';
SELECT full_name, hire_date FROM employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, email FROM employee WHERE hire_date>'2021-01-01';
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) FROM department GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department, email FROM employee WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM department WHERE department_name LIKE 'Sal%'

SELECT emp.full_name, ack.date_acknowledged, co.code_description FROM employee emp INNER JOIN acknowledgment ack ON emp.employee_id = ack.employee_id INNER JOIN code_of_conduct co ON ack.code_id = co.code_id WHERE ack.date_acknowledged >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ack.date_acknowledged DESC
SELECT ack_id, employee_id, code_id, date_acknowledged FROM acknowledgment WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND code_id = 'C001'
SELECT dep.department_name, emp.full_name FROM department dep LEFT JOIN employee emp ON dep.department_code = emp.department ORDER BY dep.department_name ASC, emp.full_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM code_of_conduct JOIN employees ON code_of_conduct.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT e.employee_id, e.employee_name, c.acknowledgement_date FROM employees e JOIN code_of_conduct c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id;
SELECT e.employee_name, v.violation_description FROM employees e JOIN violations v ON e.employee_id = v.employee_id WHERE v.violation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT cr.report_id, cm.observation_date, cr.compliance_summary FROM compliance_reports cr JOIN compliance_monitoring cm ON cr.monitoring_id = cm.monitoring_id WHERE cm.compliance_status = TRUE;
